content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Haoyu Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in München. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: Hello Haoyu, nice to meet you. Let's talk about the rental price. I am always looking for the best deal, so I will try my best to get the highest price possible. How much are you willing to pay for this apartment? Remember, I only care about the price, not any other conditions.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because my goal is to secure the lowest possible price. TERMINATE
name: Haoyu Wang from China
